description:
Dropbox is a free, online service that allows you to share and back up your files securely to the cloud. Using the Dropbox folder on your computer's hard drive, your files will be synchronized to your computer and other devices (IOS, Android, etc).

The course consists of lessons which will teach you all aspects of Dropbox and how you can benefit by using Dropbox in your life. The lessons are detailed yet easy to understand, even if you are new to computers.

With 300 million users, Dropbox is a must have for any computer user who wants to share their files with others and back up their files online.
title: Dropbox (for Windows)
